definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: So the Amber Room became part of the Czar's winter palace in St Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 这样，琥珀屋就成了沙皇在圣彼得堡冬宫的一部分。

sentences.english: The Winter Palace in St Petersburg was a house for the Tsar of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 位于圣彼得堡的冬宫曾是俄国沙皇的居住地。

sentences.english: The column fronts the Winter Palace in St.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大柱面向冬宫，耸立在圣彼得堡冬宫广场。

sentences.english: The column fronts the Winter Palace in St.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大柱面向冬宫，耸立在圣彼得堡冬宫广场。

sentences.english: Cross the bridge and turn behind the Winter Palace.
sentences.chinese: 过了桥转到冬宫的后面。

sentences.english: We were all impressed with the magnificence of Russia's Winter Palace.
sentences.chinese: 气魄宏伟的俄国冬宫给我们留下了深刻的印象。

definition: Ermitazh or Hermitage museum in St Peterburg
Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
Hagia Sophia (the main cathedral of Constantinople, subsequently the major mosque of Istanbul)
pinyin: Sheng4 Suo3 fei1 ya4 da4 jiao4 tang2

definition: Russian cruiser Aurora, firing the shot signaling the 1917 revolution, a favorite of communist iconography
Potala, winter palace of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
